snippet: The sister and father of an American photojournalist taken hostage by al-Qaida in Yemen have added their public pleas for his captors to spare his life....

headline.print_headline: Sister, Father of Yemen Hostage Plead for His Life
headline.main: Sister, Father of Yemen Hostage Plead for His Life

lead_paragraph: The sister and father of an American photojournalist taken hostage by al-Qaida in Yemen have added their public pleas for his captors to spare his life.
